questions.text: Do you feel like you are able to solve important things right now?

options.text: Yes, I am able to solve everything
Maybe, I am able to solve most things
No, I am not able to solve any important thing

questions.text: Could you manage efficiently important changes right now?

options.text: Yes, I could manage important changes without problems
Maybe, I could manage some important changes
No, I cannot handle any important change

questions.text: Do you feel able to handle personal problems at the moment?

options.text: Yes, I could handle personal problems
Maybe, I could handle some personal problems
No, I cannot handle any personal problem

questions.text: Are things going as you expected today?

options.text: Yes, everything is going as I expected
Some things go as planned while others do not
No, nothing goes as planned

questions.text: Is there something that did not go as you wanted today?

options.text: Everything goes as planned
Some things are not going as planned
Nothing goes as planned

questions.text: Do you have control over things now?

options.text: Yes, everything is under control
I have control over some things, but not everything
No, everything is out of my control

questions.text: Do you feel angry because something happened that you cannot control?

options.text: No, I do not feel angry at all
I feel angry but I can control it
Yes, I feel angry beacuse I lost control

questions.text: Are you planning too many things lately?

options.text: No, I am planning what I can handle
Maybe, I am not sure if I can accomplish everything
Yes, I planned too many things, I am saturated

options.text: Yes, I control my time
I have control over my time partially
No, I cannot manage my time at all

questions.text: Is there anything that is becoming too difficult (for you) to handle now?

options.text: No, everything is manageable
I am struggling to solve some tasks
Yes, I find impossible to solve something

questions.text: Are you able to keep your thoughts together and concentrate at the moment?

options.text: Yes, I can concentrate
I can concentrate but I might lose the attention from time to time
No, I cannot concentrate at all

options.text: Yes, my focus is where I want

No, I cannot focus

options.text: Complete
Medium
No concentration

options.text: Yes, I can read a complex text without problems
Partially, I can read complex texts with some difficulties
No, I cannot read a complex text

options.text: I remember everything
I remember things but not everything I want
I cannot remember anything

options.text: I remember every name I know
I remember some of the names I know
No, I cannot remember names

options.text: Less than 5 seconds

questions.text: Do you forget things more often than before?

options.text: No, I do not forget things

Yes, I am forgetting everything

options.text: No, my head is at 100%
Partially

Yes

options.text: No
Maybe

No my batteries are empty
